alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:57PM CDT until April 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Petersburg. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at Lafayette Montezuma, Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site . East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Hazleton and Petersburg .Rainfall amounts greater than 1 inch in some locations will lead to lowland and minor flooding along the East Fork White, lower White, and Wabash Rivers. River flooding should begin as early as overnight tonight and last through next week in lower portions of the basins. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO THURSDAY, APRIL 21... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to Thursday, April 21. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Seep water occurs behind levees on Indiana side. Hutson Creek begins to overflow from backwater. Old Darwin Road and a few rural roads in eastern Clark and Crawford counties in Illinois are impassable. Low agricultural land floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 18.6 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday, April 21. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
